com.kaiserware.sailingrace

Class Activity_Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • com.kaiserware.sailingrace.Activity_Main
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback

    public class Activity_Main
extends android.app.Activity
    Main Activity from which to launch the "SailingRacePreference", "Activity_StartSequence", or "Activity_RaceInfo". Make sure to update the version number in the local build.gradle file All angles used in computations are assumed to be True North. Angles displayed on screen are measured in Magnetic North (True North + declination) except for TWA and AWA which are the difference between the Boat heading and the Wind Direction! All speeds are measure in Nautical Miles per Hour (kts = nm/hr) Created by Volker Petersen - November 2015

      • record_race_summary

        public boolean record_race_summary(java.lang.Long raceID,
                                   boolean writeToCloud)
        Method to safe the race summary into the SQLite database (local and Cloud).
        Parameters:
        raceID - - Long ID of the race for which we want to store a race summary
        writeToCloud - - if true, will write this data also to the Cloud MySQL DB

      • sync_sqlite_wind_to_web

        public int sync_sqlite_wind_to_web(java.lang.String raceID)
        Method to synchronize all local SQLite Wind records with status=0 for one specified race to the Cloud based MySQL DB
        Parameters:
        raceID - - ID of the race for which we want to store the wind data records

      • sync_sqlite_race_to_web

        public void sync_sqlite_race_to_web(android.content.ContentValues race)
        Method to add a local SQLite Race record to the Cloud based MySQL DB
        Parameters:
        race - (ContentValues) contains the race parameters computed in "record_race_summary()
